channel.title: OpenID Connect :: API Management with Kong Konnect and Serverless API Gateway
channel.description: For advanced and enterprise class requirements, OpenID Connect (OIDC) is the preferred option to implement API consumer Authentication. OIDC also provides mechanisms to implement Authorization. In fact, when applying OIDC to secure the APIs, weâ€™re delegating the Authentication process to the external Identity Provider entity. OpenID Connect is an authentication protocol built on top of OAuth 2.0 and JWT - JSON Web Token to add login and profile information about the identity who is logged in.

item.title: Kong Identity
item.description: Kong Identity Kong Identity enables you to use Konnect to generate, authenticate, and authorize API access. You can use Kong Identity to: Create authorization servers per region Issue and validate access tokens Integrate secure authentication into your Kong Gateway APIs Create a Kong Service and Route cat > httpbin.yaml << 'EOF' _format_version: "3.0" _konnect: control_plane_name: serverless-default _info: select_tags: - httpbin-service-route services: - name: httpbin-service host: httpbin.konghq.com port: 80 routes: - name: httpbin-route paths: - /httpbin-route EOF Submit the declaration
